text: Po Lai () is one of the 25 constituencies in the Sham Shui Po District of Hong Kong which was created in 1994. The constituency loosely covers Po Lai Court and Po Hei Court and part of Un Chau Estate in Cheung Sha Wan with the estimated population of 18,284. == Councillors represented == {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color:" | | 1994 | Leung Yau-fong | ADPL |- |style="background-color:" | | 2019 | Mak Wai-ming | ADPL |- |} == Election results == ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ==References== Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sham Shui Po District Council Category:1994 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1994 Category:Cheung Sha Wan
title: Po Lai (constituency)
